content: this snowflake has been directly inspired by a free pattern 1 i came across on the coats and clark 2 website the original pattern was written by mary jane protus and can be found on the coats and crafts website here 3 i have altered it to suit my way of thinking and working with crochet simplifying it a little if you like and written it out in uk crochet terms but i give full credit for the original design to mary jane protus 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/crochet-snowflake-garland 2 http //www coatsandclark com/crafts/coats+and+clark+needlecrafts+center htm 3 http //www coatsandclark com/crafts/crochet/projects/seasonal/wr1691+crochet+snowflake+garland htm
